Query on Uniprot in ID mapping to get protein name and function
annotations.

``` python
info = pd.read_excel('raw/idmapping_2025_10_142.xlsx')
```

``` python
info.function = info.function.str.replace(r'^FUNCTION:\s*', '', regex=True)
```

``` python
info.to_parquet('raw/motif_pro_info.parquet')
```
